description: Village Hotel Solihull puts you within a 15-minute drive of Sarehole Mill and National Exhibition Centre. The indoor pool is a great spot to take a dip, and guests can grab a bite to eat at Verve Grill, which serves international cuisine and is open for breakfast and dinner. A bar/lounge and a health club are offered, and rooms at this upscale hotel get the details right with iPod docks and rainfall showerheads.

DESCRIPTION.value: Village Hotel Solihull puts you within a 15-minute drive of Sarehole Mill and National Exhibition Centre. The indoor pool is a great spot to take a dip, and guests can grab a bite to eat at Verve Grill, which serves international cuisine and is open for breakfast and dinner. A bar/lounge and a health club are offered, and rooms at this upscale hotel get the details right with iPod docks and rainfall showerheads.

HOTEL_AMENITY.value:
In addition to an indoor pool, Village Hotel Solihull provides a health club, a spa tub, and a sauna. The hotel offers a restaurant and a coffee shop/caf. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. Public areas are equipped with complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access.

This 4-star property offers access to a business center and meeting rooms. 5 meeting rooms are available. This business-friendly hotel also offers a terrace, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Complimentary self parking is available on site.

Village Hotel Solihull is a smoke-free property.

DINING.value:
English breakfasts are available for a surcharge and are served each morning between 7 AM and 9:30 AM.
Verve Grill - This restaurant specializes in international cuisine and serves breakfast and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar. A children's menu is available.
The Public House - This restaurant specializes in British cuisine and serves lunch and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar. A children's menu is available.
Starbucks - This coffee shop specializes in British cuisine and serves light fare only.
Room service (during limited hours) is available.

RECREATION.value:
An indoor pool and a spa tub are on site. Other recreational amenities include a health club and a sauna.

Children under 16 years old are not allowed in the swimming pool, health club, fitness facility, or spa tub without adult supervision.

The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or nearby; fees may apply.

CHECK_IN_POLICY.value:
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

NEARBY_POINTS_OF_INTEREST.value:
Shirley Park - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Hillfield Park - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Widney Manor Golf Club - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Tudor Grange Park - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Touchwood Shopping Center - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
St. Alphege's Church - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Malvern Park - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Brueton Park - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Sarehole Mill - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
West Midlands Police Museum - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Birmingham Railway Museum - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Temple Balsall - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Birmingham Eco Park - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi
Cadbury World - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi
Cannon Hill Park - 8.8 km / 5.4 mi

The closest major airports to Village Hotel Solihull are:
Birmingham (BHX) - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Coventry (CVT) - 22.5 km / 14 mi

The preferred airport for Village Hotel Solihull is Birmingham (BHX).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

LOCATION_TEASER.value:
Location
Situated in the business district, this hotel is within 3 mi (5 km) of Shirley Park, Hillfield Park, and Tudor Grange Park. Widney Manor Golf Club and St. Alphege's Church are also within 3 mi (5 km).

KNOW_BEFORE_YOU_GO.value:
• Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms.
  • Some facilities may have restricted access. Guests can contact the property for details using the contact information on the booking confirmation.

FEES.value:
The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out.


  • Early check-in fee: GBP 15
  • Late check-out fee: GBP 20
  • Onsite credit card charges are subject to a surcharge
  • Facilities fee: GBP 5.00 per person, per stay and includes use of:

    • - Fitness facilities
    - Sauna
    - Swimming pool

The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.

ACCESSIBILITY_OPTION.value: To make requests for specific accessibility needs, complete the "Special or Accessibility Requests" section of "Trip Preferences" when you book your hotel.

TAGLINE.value: Suburban hotel in Solihull with indoor pool, restaurant

Verve Grill - This restaurant specializes in international cuisine and serves breakfast and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar. A children's menu is available.

The Public House - This restaurant specializes in British cuisine and serves lunch and dinner. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar. A children's menu is available.

Starbucks - This coffee shop specializes in British cuisine and serves light fare only.

HCOM_FEES_FACILITIES.value: Facility access costs GBP 5.00 per person, per stay. Facilities include fitness facilities, a sauna, and a swimming pool.

ROOM_FEATURE.value: Village Hotel Solihull puts you within a 15-minute drive of Sarehole Mill and National Exhibition Centre. The indoor pool is a great spot to take a dip, and guests can grab a bite to eat at Verve Grill, which serves international cuisine and is open for breakfast and dinner. A bar/lounge and a health club are offered, and rooms at this upscale hotel get the details right with iPod docks and rainfall showerheads.

SPECIAL_CHECK_IN_INSTRUCTIONS.value: Early check in is available from 11 AM weekdays and Noon on weekends. Late check out is available until 2 PM. Subject to availability. Contact the hotel directly to arrange. Contact information is in the reservation confirmation received after booking.
